items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty suggests a positive start; US, Asian markets gain
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: A gauge of global stocks advanced on Tuesday after a rally on Wall Street overshadowed disappointment over the lack of details in China's stimulus, as investor focus shifts to upcoming U.S. inflation data and corporate earnings. On Wall Street, U.S. stocks closed sharply higher as the benchmark S&P 500 bounced back from a drop of nearly 1% a day earlier, with a jump of more than 2% in technology stocks providing key support.

items.description: The company's Initial Public Offering (IPO) will be open for subscription from October 15 to October 17, with a price range set at Rs 1,866 to Rs 1,960 per share.

items.title: Will the bulls charge ahead or RBI MPC, Q2 earnings spark volatility? Infosys, IRFC in focus | Market Minutes
items.description: In this episode of Market Minutes, Harshita Tyagi talks about the key factors to watch out for today. Benchmark indices are likely to gain amid positive global cues. Investors in India will keenly eye the RBI monetary policy decision. The MPC is expected to keep policy repo rate unchanged. Analysts expect market to remain cautiously optimistic with the onset of the Q2FY25 earning season. Check the stock in focus today and also catch market expert Raj Vyas in the Voice Of the Day segment. Market Minutes is a morning podcast that puts the spotlight on hot stocks, key data points, and developing trends

items.title: Phoenix Mills shares in focus on better numbers in September 2024
items.description: Phoenix Mills Share Price | In the second quarter of the current financial year company has reported gross residential sales of Rs 27 crore and collections of Rs 65 crore in Q2 FY25.

items.description: IRB Infrastructure Developers Share Price | A meeting of the board of directors of the company is scheduled to be held on October 9, 2024, to, consider and approve the proposal of raising of debt.

On Wall Street, U.S. stocks closed sharply higher as the benchmark S&P 500 bounced back from a drop of nearly 1% a day earlier, with a jump of more than 2% in technology stocks providing key support.

items.title: Agri Picks Report October 09, 2024: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: According to Geojit, Farmers in Andhra Pradesh have sown kharif crops over 2.8 million hectares as of Thursday, up more than 16% from 2.4 million hectares sown in the corresponding period last year, according to a report by the state's agricultural department.

items.title: Live: Will Nifty bulls prevail as focus shifts to RBI policy? Hyundai IPO next week| Opening Bell
items.description: The market snapped its six-day losing streak on October 8, rising nearly a percent to close just above the 25,000 mark after a 5.6% decline from its all-time high. Experts feel consolidation is likely to be seen in the upcoming sessions until the index gives a strong close above 25,500, with key support in the 24,750-24,700 zone. If the index sustains above 25,000, immediate resistance on the higher side is likely to be at 25,200-25,300. However, if the index falls below 25,000, 24,800 is the immediate level to watch, according to experts. Meanwhile, the RBI will announce its policy decision today. The central bank is expected to hold interest rates steady for a tenth straight time, however, the stance may be changed to neutral from withdrawal of accommodation. Commentary from the RBI Governor on the road ahead may be a key factor in determining market sentiment in mid-week trading before TCS kickstarts the earnings season on Thursday.Among stocks in focus will be Dr Reddyâ€™s, IRB Infra, Ola Electric and PB Fintech. Catch Nandita Khemka in conversation with Anil Rego, MD & CIO, Right Horizons PMS and Rajesh Palviya of Axis Securities.

items.title: Dr Reddys shares rise on positive outcome from India's maiden CAR-T cell trial for blood cancer
items.description: The trial also showed a favorable safety profile, as no severe side effects like Cytokine Release Syndrome (CRS) or neurotoxicity were observed.

items.title: Senco Gold stock surges 4.5% on robust Q2 business updates; retail growth up 27%
items.description: Senco Gold has projected a 18-20 percent year-on-year revenue growth for FY25, fueled by the festive season of Dhanteras, Diwali, and Durga Puja. The company also plans to boost its studded jewellery ratio to over 12 percent.

items.description: Chinaâ€™s markets are shedding recent gains after stimulus measures post-holidays failed to meet inflated expectations. Unless a substantial fiscal stimulus is announced, markets are unlikely to sustain gains

items.title: SpiceJet stock jumps 7% as airline settles $132 million lessor dispute for $22.5 million
items.description: SpiceJet's settlement with with lessors under BBAM comes amid the airline's ongoing efforts to strengthen the balance sheet and revitalise operations. The stock jumped 7%, adding to yesterday's 9% gain.

items.description: ICICI Securities is bullish on Eureka Forbes recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 660 in its research report dated October 09, 2024.

items.description: This development follows MSEDCL's previous letter of intent, issued on September 17, 2024, for 1,500 MW.

items.title: Stock of the day| Is Nazara Tech in a vantage position to capitalise on opportunities
items.description: Nazara Technologies, a diversified gaming and sports media platform with presence in India and other emerging and developed markets, is in a prime position to capitalise on the opportunities in the gaming ecosystem. The company continues to scale up its presence with meaningful forward-looking steps for the different business verticals.  Gaming company Nazara Technologies is a growth-oriented company that is successfully executing an expansion strategy in a rapidly growing market. The company is actively scouting acquisitions to add new growth levers to its business.

items.description: Ajmera Realty remains confident of achieving its sales guidance by the second half of FY25, fueled by the upcoming festive season and strong demand.

items.description: The regulatory clearance for Alembic Pharma's Gujarat facility came without any observations. The USFDA had inspected the facility on October 7-8.

items.title: Divi's Labs hits record high after Citi initiates 'buy' call with most bullish price target
items.description: Citi sees Divi's Labs as the key beneficiary of the trend toward supply chain diversification. As a result, they became the first brokerage to forecast that the drugmaker's stock would surpass the Rs 6,000 mark.
